hero.subheadline: We build AI systems that handle your editing, research, and operations — so you can focus on making videos that matter.

value.label: Why Partner With Us
value.description: Other agencies consult and leave. We embed with your channel, build custom AI workflows, and stay until the metrics move. Your growth is our only KPI.
value.benefit1Desc: We don't hand you a strategy doc. We build working AI systems that cut your editing time in half.
value.benefit2Desc: From script research to thumbnail A/B testing, from comment management to sponsor outreach — we've automated it all.
value.benefit3Desc: Not ChatGPT wrappers. Custom AI agents trained on your voice, your style, your audience.

process.label: Our Process
process.headline: From chaos to flow in 30 days
process.step1Desc: We map every hour you spend off-camera. Research, editing, scheduling, admin — we find the 80% that AI can handle.
process.step2Desc: We rank opportunities by time saved x frequency. Most channels recover 15-20 hours per week in the first sprint.
process.step3Desc: We ship custom AI agents that run 24/7. Automated editing pipelines. Research assistants. Comment moderators. All trained on your standards.

mission.label: Our Mission
mission.description: Your audience doesn't care about your backend. They care about your content. We handle the invisible work so every hour you invest goes into what they see.

contact.label: Get Started
contact.headline: Ready to double your output?
contact.description: See exactly how much time you're losing to non-creative work. Free 30-minute audit — no pitch, just data.
contact.note: 30-min channel audit • Walk away with actionable insights
